body.p: Your communication respecting my reappointment as commissioner for is before me I herewith enclose $5. Statute fee. I reside in Kentucky but have my office in just across BrooklynN. Y. City -- the river

Please send commission
and oblige Yours Very Respty
Lewis Hurst

Jas B Page
Asst Sectr'y of State
New York
Comr Deeds
Wm Hurst
Lewis Hurst
comd
14th Mch/65
